com.safenetinc.luna.provider.keygen

Class LunaKeyPairDerivationBIP32Master

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.KeyPairGeneratorSpi
      • com.safenetinc.luna.provider.keygen.LunaKeyPairDerivationBIP32Master

  • public class LunaKeyPairDerivationBIP32Master
extends java.security.KeyPairGeneratorSpi
    Specify the mechanism and operations to derive a Hierarchical Deterministic master KeyPair.

    • Field Detail

      • LOGGER

      • mCurve

        protected LunaNamedCurve mCurve
        Bip32 curve is "secp256k1"

      • mechType

        protected long mechType
        Specifies either master or child KeyPair to be derived.

      • baseKey

        protected LunaKey baseKey
        Base key from which to derive a KeyPair. Can be a seed from which to derive the master KeyPair or a public or private key from which to derive a child KeyPair.

      • path

        protected int[] path
        An integer array containing the key derivation path elements. Bits to specify hardened or normal keys will be enabled.

      • attributes

        protected LunaPkcs11Attributes attributes

    • Constructor Detail

      • LunaKeyPairDerivationBIP32Master

    • Method Detail

      • convertPath

        protected int[] convertPath(java.lang.String pathStr)
        Convert the BIP32 key path to an integer array for passing to the HSM.

        Note: The path MUST be specified using the notation in the BIP44 specification: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0044.mediawiki#path-levels

        Example: "m/12'/34'/56/78"

        Observe:

        Path elements ending with an apostrophe "'" will be created as hardened keys. A leading "m" is decorative only.

        Parameters:
        pathStr - the string representation of the path
        Returns:
        an array containing the integer values for each path element

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec params,
              java.security.SecureRandom random)
                throws java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Initialize the BIP32 key derivation operation based on the supplied LunaBIP32ParameterSpec.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class java.security.KeyPairGeneratorSpi
        Parameters:
        params - an instance of a LunaBIP32ParameterSpec
        random - unused
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - If the parameterspec is not a LunaBIP32ParameterSpec
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - If base key is unspecified

      • initialize

        public void initialize(int i,

        Returns:
